title: Google\Cloud\Domains\V1beta1\DnsSettings
name: DnsSettings
description:
Defines the DNS configuration of a Registration, including name servers, DNSSEC, and glue records.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.domains.v1beta1.DnsSettings

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.custom_dns
params.description: An arbitrary DNS provider identified by its name servers.

params.name: data.google_domains_dns
params.description: The free DNS zone provided by Google Domains.

params.name: data.glue_records
params.description: The list of glue records for this Registration. Commonly empty.
